text:
Plastiq | San Francisco, CA and Boston, MA | Onsite | https://www.plastiq.com

Plastiq is bill pay with benefits. Pay rent, taxes, even business supplies, to skyrocket your rewards, simplify payments and use your working capital in the ways that make the most sense for you. Plastiq is the only way to maximize your cash on hand by allowing you to put virtually any expense on your credit card.

To learn more about who we are, our engineering culture, and whether this is the right place for you, read our Key Values profile: https://www.keyvalues.com/plastiq.

Our open positions (We are hiring for the positions below in both San Francisco and Boston):

* Lead DevOps Engineer: https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/plastiqcom/view/P_AA...

* Senior Software Engineer: https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/plastiqcom/view/P_AA...

* Senior Software Engineer - Test & Delivery: https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/plastiqcom/view/P_AA...

* Software Engineer: https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/plastiqcom/view/P_AA...

Tech Stack: JavaScript, Node.js, AWS Lambda, PHP, Java, MySQL
